bill.title: Electric Guns
bill.description: Authorizes law enforcement officers of the Department of Public Safety and conservation and resources enforcement officers of the Department of Land and Natural Resources to use electric guns and related equipment while performing their duties. Effective July 1, 2010. (CD1)

referrals.name: Public Safety, Intergovernmental and Military Affairs

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to PSM/WTL, JGO.
Carried over to 2010 Regular Session.
(S) The committee(s) on PSM/WTL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-11-10 1:30pm in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on WTL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WTL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Bunda, Fukunaga, Takamine, Hemmings; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Tokuda, Kokubun.

(S) The committee(s) on PSM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PSM were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Espero, Bunda, Gabbard, Galuteria, Kidani, Hemmings; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) English.
(S) Reported from PSM/WTL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2295) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JGO.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JGO.
(S) The committee(s) on JGO will hold a public decision making on 02-23-10 10:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JGO recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JGO were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Gabbard, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Takamine, Bunda.
(S) Reported from JGO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2562) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-02-10.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Hooser, Ihara . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 33) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to PBS/WLO, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 36
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by PBS/WLO on Thursday, 03-11-10 10:15AM in House conference room 309.

(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 03-16-10 2:15PM in House conference room 325.

The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, Ito, Belatti, Herkes, Luke, McKelvey, Mizuno, Morita, B.
